library(plotly)

## R Markdown
April 23, 2018

```{r}
#pull stock data
getSymbols('GOOGL', src='yahoo')

#get the chart ready
df= data.frame(Date = index(GOOGL), coredata(GOOGL))

g = df %>%
  plot_ly(x = ~ Date, type='ohlc',
          open = ~GOOGL.Open, close=~GOOGL.Close,
          high = ~GOOGL.High, low=~GOOGL.Low) %>%
  layout(title='Google OHLC Chart')

#show plot
g
```
